name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notemark — Quick note web pages to view later

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A better way to bookmark things you only need for a short while.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HOW TO: After you've added it to Chrome,
go on any page and click the extension icon, then click on the heart.

Who made this?
- Maxwell A. Davis (designer, StudioTBT)
- Tomáš Taro (developer, Adblock)
